text: Kangaroo is a 1987 Australian drama movie directed by Tim Burstall and is based on the 1923 novel of the same name by D. H. Lawrence. It stars Colin Friels, Judy Davis, John Walton and Julie Nihill. == Other websites == * Category:1987 drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Kangaroo (1987 movie)
